860610.name: Fantasy Grounds - Strange Supernaturals, Volume 3 (Token Pack)
860610.description:
Strange Supernaturals, Volume 3

Reframe your game with Monster Grin's 65 unique new tokens, each usable as PCs, NPCs, mooks, monsters, or bosses - whatever works. Everything from otherworldly tentacled horrors to plague-spreading monstrosities lurk within this pack, all waiting to invade your game.
Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of whats what and whos who and keep your game rockin'!
This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, red, and silver):
  • Doomspinner
  • Khanian
  • Krieg
  • Vector
  • Weldwolf
Conversion by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
